about_the_game:
Rescue Rina is a 2D Top-Down Sci-Fi themed adventure game based on the story of Rina, a young girl, who got kidnapped by the Evil scientists of Magix Corp. The purpose was to channel all of her human emotions into a special Heart-shaped Crystal capable of storing certain human emotions in the form of data that could later be transferred to the Robots.

One day, Hume, who is the main protagonist, confessed his feelings to Rina and wanted to meet her on the riverside surrounded by cherry trees. She agreed to his proposal and was looking forward to the day. Hume reached the location on time but even after waiting for about a few hours, she did not show up. However, things took a darker turn when he got a call from Rina's mom who told him that she did not return home. Hume was restless and wanted to go to the location by himself for clues. But as soon as he reached the location, he found a Giant crystal which was shining bright. As soon as he touched the crystal he got teleported to The Magix Corp. world where he came across various traps and the challenges.

Soon, he came to know that Rina got captured by the Evil Scientists for experimentation on human emotions and he vowed to rescue her as soon as possible no matter what happens.

You play as the main protagonist, Hume, whose mission is to rescue Rina at all costs. Would you be able to solve the mystery of Heart-shaped crystals and rescue her unharmed?

Key Features:

  • Explore the Magix Corp. World!
  • Various Kinds of Traps including Saws, Thorns, Laser beams, etc.
  • Collect various items including Money, Crystals, Golden Bars, etc.
  • Ability to sell items to the shopkeepers!
  • Interact with computers, security systems, and switches!
  • Story Driven.



Note: I am a solo indie game developer and I have done all of the graphics, artwork, animation, programming, character design except for the music. I hope you will enjoy the game.
